course_name: Mastering the Art of Playing Guitar
review_details: This guitar course was fantastic! The instructor's teaching style was engaging, and I learned so many new techniques. Highly recommended!

course_name: Mastering the Keys: Piano Playing Fundamentals
review_details: An outstanding piano course! The lessons were well-structured, and the instructor's expertise really shines through. I feel more confident in my piano skills now.

course_name: The Art of Drumming: From Beginner to Groove Master
review_details: Great drumming course for beginners! I improved my rhythm and timing significantly. The instructor's explanations were clear, and the exercises were enjoyable.
An okay course for learning the accordion. It covered the basics, but I wish there were more advanced techniques taught. Still, I had fun learning the instrument.
Absolutely loved this flute course! The instructor's passion for the instrument is contagious. I feel inspired and can already play some beautiful melodies!
